main.name: Messaoud GUERNOUTI
main.description: Managing team mor then 10 persons, we are using ReactJS as FrontEnd framework, Spring Boot (Hibernate) as Backend framework, and for Mobile part we use the native system Android(Kotlin)/iOS(Swift)
main.bio: Since More then 14 years Using the leatest Java J2EE technology as Spring Framework (Multiple migration From 3 to 4 and also To Spring 5), JPA/Hibernate. Since the last years we are spliting the FrontEnd by using ReactJS framework. As Mobile Application I used Android Native (Java) & iOS Swift. There are also Mutiple CMS that I have Used such as Liferay, Alfresco ... I have Also another Cap For Security Developement (OWASP) and Certification/implementing of ISO 27001:2013
main.contactmessage: You can get touch with me through diffrent ways Phone , Mail , Form :)

resume.technologiesmessage: I'm always interested in playing around with new technologies but these are the ones that have really won me over

education.school: University of Science and Technology Houari Boumediene

technologies.name: Spring
technologies.description: I am very passionate about this framework I worked more than ten years with the MVC and with the release of Spring Boot everything becomes very easy. Thanks Spring Cummuanity

technologies.name: React JS
technologies.description: The ReactJS is a wonderful JavaScript Framworke, it help to easly/quickly build a nice user interface. We starting use it since 5 years ago

technologies.name: Android/iOS
technologies.description: These technologies are becoming increasingly important years after years. I started Development on mobile technologies since 2013, also I have agood knowledge on Hybrid Development (React Native)

technologies.name: Git
technologies.description: The Good one and the Moste populaire Version Control on the World, I have Installed and Managed the Server Git on Ooredoo Company, more then 6 Years using this magnific Version Control. We are using on all our Projects

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
